targets.rawSql:
-- Cardinality / Unique Entities
-- Unique entities over time
WITH
    toDateTime($__from / 1000) AS from_ts,
    toDateTime($__to / 1000)   AS to_ts,
    $__interval_s              AS step,

    grid AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(generate_series - generate_series % 60) AS time
        FROM generateSeries(toUInt32(from_ts), toUInt32(to_ts), step)
    ),

    agg AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(toUnixTimestamp(toStartOfMinute(occurred_at))) AS time,
            uniqExact(tuple(entity_type, entity_id)) AS unique_entities
        FROM integration_events_raw
        WHERE occurred_at >= from_ts
          AND occurred_at <= to_ts
        GROUP BY time
    )

SELECT
    g.time,
    coalesce(a.unique_entities, 0) AS unique_entities
FROM grid AS g
LEFT JOIN agg AS a
    ON g.time = a.time
ORDER BY g.time

-- Cardinality / Unique Entities
-- Avg events per entity
WITH
    toDateTime($__from / 1000) AS from_ts,
    toDateTime($__to / 1000)   AS to_ts,
    $__interval_s              AS step,

    grid AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(generate_series - generate_series % 60) AS time
        FROM generateSeries(toUInt32(from_ts), toUInt32(to_ts), step)
    ),

    per_entity AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(toUnixTimestamp(toStartOfMinute(occurred_at))) AS time,
            tuple(entity_type, entity_id) AS entity_key,
            count(*) AS events_cnt
        FROM integration_events_raw
        WHERE occurred_at >= from_ts
          AND occurred_at <= to_ts
        GROUP BY time, entity_key
    ),

    agg AS (
        SELECT
            time,
            avg(events_cnt) AS avg_events_per_entity
        FROM per_entity
        GROUP BY time
    )

SELECT
    g.time,
    coalesce(a.avg_events_per_entity, 0) AS avg_events_per_entity
FROM grid AS g
LEFT JOIN agg AS a
    ON g.time = a.time
ORDER BY g.time

-- Cardinality / Unique Entities
-- P95 events per entity
WITH
    toDateTime($__from / 1000) AS from_ts,
    toDateTime($__to / 1000)   AS to_ts,
    $__interval_s              AS step,

    grid AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(generate_series - generate_series % 60) AS time
        FROM generateSeries(toUInt32(from_ts), toUInt32(to_ts), step)
    ),

    per_entity AS (
        SELECT
            toDateTime(toUnixTimestamp(toStartOfMinute(occurred_at))) AS time,
            tuple(entity_type, entity_id) AS entity_key,
            count(*) AS events_cnt
        FROM integration_events_raw
        WHERE occurred_at >= from_ts
          AND occurred_at <= to_ts
        GROUP BY time, entity_key
    ),

    agg AS (
        SELECT
            time,
            quantileExact(0.95)(events_cnt) AS p95_events_per_entity
        FROM per_entity
        GROUP BY time
    )

SELECT
    g.time,
    coalesce(a.p95_events_per_entity, 0) AS p95_events_per_entity
FROM grid AS g
LEFT JOIN agg AS a
    ON g.time = a.time
ORDER BY g.time

WITH
    toUInt32($__from / 1000) AS from_ts,
    toUInt32($__to / 1000)   AS to_ts

SELECT
    toDateTime(grid.t) AS time,
    CAST(types.entity_type AS String) AS type,
    coalesce(data.events_count, 0) AS metric
FROM
(
    /* временная сетка */
    SELECT
        arrayJoin(
            range(
                intDiv(from_ts, s.step) * s.step,
                intDiv(to_ts, s.step) * s.step + s.step,
                s.step
            )
        ) AS t
    FROM
    (
        SELECT intDiv($__interval_ms, 1000) AS step
    ) AS s
) AS grid
CROSS JOIN
(
    /* список entity_type */
    SELECT DISTINCT entity_type
    FROM eck1_analytics.events_per_minute_by_type_by_entity_type
) AS types
LEFT JOIN
(
    /* агрегированные данные */
    SELECT
        intDiv(toUInt32(minute), s.step) * s.step AS t,
        entity_type,
        sum(events_count) AS events_count
    FROM eck1_analytics.events_per_minute_by_type_by_entity_type
    CROSS JOIN
    (
        SELECT intDiv($__interval_ms, 1000) AS step
    ) AS s
    WHERE minute >= toDateTime($__from / 1000)
      AND minute <= toDateTime($__to / 1000)
    GROUP BY
        t,
        entity_type
) AS data
ON grid.t = data.t
AND types.entity_type = data.entity_type
ORDER BY
    time,
    metric

WITH
    intDiv(300000, 1000) AS step,
    toUInt32($__from/ 1000) AS from_ts,
    toUInt32($__to / 1000) AS to_ts

SELECT
    toDateTime(t) AS time,
    coalesce(sum(events_count), 0) AS count
FROM
(
    SELECT
        arrayJoin(
            range(
                intDiv(from_ts, step) * step,
                intDiv(to_ts, step) * step + step,
                step
            )
        ) AS t
) grid
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT
        intDiv(toUInt32(minute), step) * step AS t,
        sum(events_count) AS events_count
    FROM "eck1_analytics"."events_per_minute_by_type_by_entity_type"
    WHERE  ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime )
    GROUP BY t
) data
USING t
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
